name: Kaleidoscope 3D
description:
Kaleidoscope 3D uses pleasantly colorful themes alongside interesting shapes that create an almost realistic experience of an authentic Kaleidoscope. Beautiful vivid colors and curious shapes, in an unpredictable pattern of motion, can be useful for meditation, to relax, and enhancement of imagination. Accompanied by background music, 18 different tracks, that help to set the mood. After a long stressful day, a few minutes of Kaleidoscope time may help the brain to relieve the stress and tune in into a more peaceful and cheerful state. Kaleidoscope is based on randomness and repetition, just like the nature of human life, that each of us needs to accept, eventually. We might feel not so comfortable because of those forces, but we can learn to embrace and enjoy the results of chance and periodicity. And once in a while for a brief moment, Kaleidoscope of life can create a wonderfully unique and inspirational vision that our mind is longing so much to observe.

In practice Kaleidoscope 3D is a simulation in the structure and functionality of a virtual Kaleidoscope. Our Kaleidoscope automatically rotates, zooms and moves, but every parameter can be adjusted or canceled. It can be controlled manually by touch gestures. Users may customize the capacity of shapes and the speed in which they are shuffled. 

Kaleidoscope comes with a set of shapes and colors, candy-themed, like different candies accompanied by a bright set of complementary material, that the user can enjoy free of charge. The user might choose to purchase additional sets of shapes and materials, which include: Gems, Winter, Halloween, and Fruits themes, with unique shapes and matching materials. To celebrate 2020 we added new exciting Geometric shapes and Pastel colors. Sets of shapes can be combined with different sets of materials to create new and interesting combinations. Kaleidoscope background color can be adjusted to: black, dark gray, white, yellow, red, lime green, blue, bright orange, pale pink, violet, cyan, brown, peach, smoke, mint, cornflower, french rose, and chili.
Music can be muted. User can choose one of the 18 musical tracks to play, that would be followed by other random track, and so on in a loop.

New Features:
- Lighting quality improved, with a dynamic behavior system. 
- Inspirational quotes.
- Four special occasions added to celebrate each season, with free access for all users to a certain theme on every occasion. 
- Improved control with keyboard and D-pad.
- Shuffle can be suspended immediately, with all objects stopping at a place.
- The slow-motion effect improved.
- New vibrant background colors: bright orange, pale pink, violet, cyan, brown, peach, smoke, mint, cornflower, french rose, and chili.

Gems shapes: Round, Princess, Asscher, Cushion, Trillion, and others.
Winter shapes: Snowman, Snowball, Winter Hat and Glove, Christmas tree, 9 Snowflakes with 6 and 8 edges.
Halloween shapes: Castle, Black Cat, Spiderweb, Pumpkin, Bat, Spider, Broom, Pot, Hat, and others.
Fruits shapes: Apple, Watermelon, Cherry, Pomegranate, Lemon, Kiwi, Pineapple, Banana, Pear, Plum, Mango, Berries.
Geometric shapes: Cube, Pyramid, Cone, Pentagon, Sphere, Torus, Cylinder, Tetrahedron, Dodecahedron, Octahedron.
